ModMetaData.name: Pantoran
ModMetaData.author: Tgrimm92
ModMetaData.description:
Pantoran are blue-skinnd near-humans native to the moon Pantora. Pantoran were members of the Galactic Repubic.
ComfyTemperature (-100,28)
Release adds the following features Pantoran Pawns Starting Scenario Pantoran Faction
Add Ons -Hair -Outfit -Weapons
Dependencies This mod depends on the alien race framework by Erdelf. You can view its original post here https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=839005762, but at the time of the writing of this post the release is on beta 18 while 1.0 is required. You can obtain 1.0 on their github https://github.com/erdelf/AlienRaces/releases. Until Erdelf updates versioning the 1.0 does work just ignore the fact that it is red in the mod list.
Source https://github.com/tgrimabc?tab=repositories
Discord https://discord.gg/ZBFxJHe
Patreon https://www.patreon.com/user?u=13220445
Credit: Halno Art Antarann FireBlade "AR" Art I would like to thank both of them for helping me with new hairstyles.
